subject: Climate & Environment
title: Agroforestry: Farms and Trees Together
description: A short lesson to help you apply Agroforestry: Farms and Trees Together.

hook.text: What if farmers didn't have to choose between crops and trees?

buildup.text: Agroforestry mixes trees with crops or livestock on the same land.

discovery.text: Shade from trees reduces heat stress on crops and livestock, boosting productivity.

twist.text: Tree roots pull nutrients from deep soil layers that crops can't reach on their own.

climax.text: Agroforestry sequesters carbon, prevents erosion, and increases farmer income.

punchline.text: The farm of the future has trees in it, not around it.

quiz.question: What is agroforestry?
options: Mixing trees with crops or livestock on the same land
